BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent

Class CDUseCaseReactivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.modules.ClassDiagram.mainContent.CDUseCaseReactivator

  • public class CDUseCaseReactivator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handels reactivating of class diagram and use case diagram. When class should be reactivated to use case diagram, or class should be reactivated with specific use case, this class will handle it.
    Author:
    Karel Hala.

      Basic constructor that sets CDUseCaseConnector and PlaceManager.

      Method that adds buttons based on whether user can reactivate or activate with selected class.

      Method for reactivating all inactive models and lines.
